description:
Unlocks the following items: S. Chaltier 

A weapon wielded by Leon Magnus in Tales of Destiny.
BGM Change: "Lion-Irony of Fate"

Sword Skin/Tales series DLC. ATK 55, AGI 20.
Alters Sword Appearance to "Swordian Chaltier" and alters battle music.

*This item is included in the Deco Item: "Tales of" Set.
name: Deco Item: S. Chaltier
